title: Drawing, "Stage Design: Garden Setting with Fountains and Arbors", ca. 1750
medium: Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite, ruled borders in pen and black on white laid paper, laid down

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Stage Design: Garden Setting with Fountains and Arbors", ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite, ruled borders in pen and black on white laid paper, laid down. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-106.
